changelog:
Alpha 2 - Theme Adjustment & Smarter Updates

   This alpha focuses on a major workflow change: the classic update dialog has been retired and replaced with a full Update Page, giving you a clearer, more reliable, and more flexible update experience. Alongside that, UI behaviors, theming, and navigation continue to be refined.

⦁ Added:
 ▫ New Update Page replaces the old Update Dialog, enabling direct in-app update downloads.
 ▫ Downloaded update app now saved to the user-selected path for easier access and management.
 ▫ App now follows system dark mode when the device supports it.

⦁ Updated:
 ▫ System UI colors now react dynamically when opening or closing the navigation drawer on the Home screen.
 ▫ Refined app color tones for better consistency across themes.

⦁ Improved:
 ▫ BottomNavigationView now uses rounded top corners for a cleaner, more modern edge.

⦁ Fixed:
 ▫ Navigate-back button in the Code Snippet list now correctly follows the M3 Expressive style.
 ▫ Corrected the banner image displayed on the Privacy Policy & Terms of Service screen.
